import React from 'react'; import './RatingSelect.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; const RatingSelect = ({onSelect}) => { const [selected , setSelected] = useState(10); const handleChange = (e) => { // console.log(typeof +e.currentTarget.value); setSelected(+e.currentTarget.value); onSelect(+e.currentTarget.value); } return
}; export default RatingSelect;
